name: market for natural gas liquids | natural gas liquids | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/639/documentation

This is a market activity. Each market represents the consumption mix of a product in a given geography, connecting suppliers with consumers of the same product in the same geographical area. Markets group the producers and also the imports of the product (if relevant) within the same geographical area. They also account for transport to the consumer and for the losses during that process, when relevant.;This is the market for  'natural gas liquids', in the Global geography.;This market contains no transport or losses, as they are irrelevant for the delivered product.;natural gas liquids' is a fossil fuel with a calorific value of 24.624 MJ/kg. It is used as a liquid fuel and is sourced from unprocessed natural gas. Its main applications are in the following sectors: domestic fuel for cooking and heating, industrial fuel and plastics raw material.

This activity starts at the gate of the activities that produce 'natural gas liquids',  within the geography of Global.

This activity ends with the supply of  natural gas liquids', to the consumers of this product. Transport or losses are considered irrelevant for this product.
